Data commit, entity_props.xml is not used anymore, Vision loads & saves either entity_props_pitch1.xml or entity_props_pitch2.xml.
Commented out some stuff in simulator to supress warnings.

* Completely redesigned the Strategy module, now works with actions & conditions. Easier to write complex strategies, no need to re-plan all the time. Right now, KickBallAction is a bit of a do-everything action, I need to refactor that a little bit. * Changed our game-playing strategy to a simple yet continuous (in the mathematical sense) function, that worked _very_ well during the Sunday tournament. * Obstacle avoidance was moved to Control, but it's not working yet. I'm planning on changing our obstacle avoidance to a simpler, more predictable method. * Fixed not stopping at goal in Control - should work much more predictably now. * Implemented flags for Control to specify reversing, matching rotation, avoid walls etc. * Made Control use the pitch size from World. * Made it easier to change between pitches - still not ideal, but there's two changes needed, at the top of Vision.java and PcServer.java. * Milestone strategies don't work anymore, if anyone has the patience they can port them to the new Strategy framework, right now other stuff is high priority. * The click-to-go behaviour was given a face-lift. By click-dragging aiming can be specified as well. Shift-clicking adds a waypoint, so one can specify a path. This behaviour is now part of the NormalMatchStrategy (we may want to create a DebugStrategy instead), thus cleaning up the listeners in NxtGui and SimGui.

Mielstone 4 work, vision update - using robot contour for black circle model, gui update - image viewer has drawing functions defined, newIplImageListeners are not neccessary anymore. Some simulator fixes too
Milestone 4 strategy added, fixed ball detection and a bug in robot detection.
